summary: Room page currently fails to load due to stopped IC canister; user wants code fixed so the room page works normally and supports adding devices inside rooms.
architectural_notes: App relies on Internet Computer canister method getRoomInfo; failures occur when the target canister is stopped (Reject code 5 / IC0508).
Frontend should handle canister-stopped/unavailable errors gracefully to keep room page usable.
known_issues: Room page error: "Failed to Load Room" when calling getRoomInfo because canister p3v6c-cqaaa-aaaab-aalga-cai is stopped (Reject code 5, IC0508).

existing_features.title: Improve Room Details page error handling so the page remains usable when backend calls fail (including the case where the backend canister is stopped) and provides a clear recovery path.
Make adding devices to a room reliable by eliminating client-side timestamp-based device ID generation and replacing it with a backend-provided unique device ID allocation flow.
Ensure the Room Details device list updates immediately after adding devices so users can confirm devices were added to the selected room.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable adding devices inside rooms from the room page.

projectName: Fix Room Details page loading failure and ensure devices can be added to rooms reliably
